text: Battle of Toulon may refer to: * Battle of Toulon (1707) during the War of the Spanish Succession * Battle of Toulon (1744) during the War of the Austrian Succession * Battle of Toulon (1944), a liberation of the city by French forces following Operation Dragoon ==See also== * Siege of Toulon, a 1793 military operation during the French Revolutionary Wars * Scuttling of the French fleet in Toulon during World War II
title: Battle of Toulon
